official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, relating to nonprofit service clubs qualifying for third-class nonprofit rates of postage.

summary.text: Entitles nonprofit service clubs to the reduced postage rates for third-class mail currently in effect for the mail matter of qualified nonprofit organizations.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, relating to nonprofit service clubs qualifying for third-class nonprofit rates of postage.
